posts.post_content:
When disregarding creature types, [Meng Huo, Barbarian King](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Meng Huo, Barbarian King) is a preferable choice most of the time for being 4/4 (in any zone) instead of just 3/4 (while on the battlefield).  
Kaysa, being an Elf Druid has somewhat decent creature types, but a Human Barbarian Soldier might be useful as well.
posts.html:
